Disable blocks that you don't want to ap: Disable blocks that you don't want to appear in the inserter. They can always be toggled back on later.
Templates help define the layout of the: Templates help define the layout of the site. You can customise all aspects of your posts and pages using blocks and patterns in this editor.

Each block comes with its own set of con: Each block comes with its own set of controls for changing things like colour, width and alignment. These will show and hide automatically when you have a block selected.
All of the blocks available to you live: All of the blocks available to you live in the block library. You’ll find it wherever you see the <InserterIconImage /> icon.

In the WordPress editor, each paragraph,: In the WordPress editor, each paragraph, image or video is presented as a distinct “block” of content.
